content.raw: There is also a bug when using static digital Ouputs on line 184. A dict doesn't have the property `static_value`. This should be `digital_out_table = self.convert_bools_to_bytes(digitals.values())` but that causes a bug with labscript which I will make a pull request about over at the labscript repo.
content.html: There is also a bug when using static digital Ouputs on line 184. A dict doesn't have the property static_value. This should be digital_out_table = self.convert_bools_to_bytes(digitals.values()) but that causes a bug with labscript which I will make a pull request about over at the labscript repo.
